Translations.Text: veyevme neb`asu min kulli ummetin sehiden summe la yu'zenu lillezine keferu vela hum yusta`tebun
veiza rae-llezine zalemu-l`azabe fela yuhaffefu `anhum vela hum yunzarun
veiza rae-llezine esraku surakaehum kalu rabbena haulai surakaune-llezine kunna ned`u min dunik. feelkav ileyhimu-lkavle innekum lekazibun
veelkav ile-llahi yevmeizin-sseleme vedalle `anhum ma kanu yefterun
ellezine keferu vesaddu `an sebili-llahi zidnahum `azaben fevka-l`azabi bima kanu yufsidun
veyevme neb`asu fi kulli ummetin sehiden `aleyhim min enfusihim veci'na bike sehiden `ala haula'. venezzelna `aleyke-lkitabe tibyanel likulli sey'iv vehudev verahmetev vebusra lilmuslimin
